001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Mediator;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
007
008import java.util.*;
009
010/**
011 * Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
012 * <p>
013 * A neural network is modeled here as an extensible estimation strategy: it accepts
014 * inputs (features), transforms them through a series of layers composed of {@link Neuron}s
015 * and weighted connections, and produces outputs (predictions).
016 * </p>
017 */
018@Mediator
019public class DefaultNeuralNetwork implements NeuralNetwork {
020
021    private final List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers;
022    private final Map<Neuron, Pair<Integer, Integer>> positions;
023    private final Map<Neuron, List<Neuron>> connections;
024
025    /**
026     * Constructs a neural network for the provided layers.
027     *
028     * @param layers the layers of the neural network
029     */
030    public DefaultNeuralNetwork(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
031        this.layers = layers;
032        this.positions = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronPositions(layers);
033        this.connections = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronConnections(layers);
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * {@inheritDoc}
038     */
039    @Override
040    public int getWidth(int l) {
041        return layers.get(l).size();
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * {@inheritDoc}
046     */
047    @Override
048    public int getDepth() {
049        return layers.size() - 1;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * {@inheritDoc}
054     */
055    @Override
056    public Neuron getNeuron(int l, int j) {
057        return layers.get(l).get(j);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * {@inheritDoc}
062     */
063    @Override
064    public <N extends Neuron> N getNeuron(int l, int j, Class<N> classType) {
065        return classType.cast(getNeuron(l, j));
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * {@inheritDoc}
070     */
071    @Override
072    public Map<Neuron, Float> getOutputConnections(int l, int j) {
073        Neuron neuron = getNeuron(l, j);
074        List<Neuron> connectedNeurons = connections.get(neuron);
075        Map<Neuron, Float> outputConnections = new IdentityHashMap<>();
076        if (connectedNeurons != null) {
077            for (Neuron connectedNeuron : connectedNeurons) {
078                outputConnections.put(connectedNeuron, connectedNeuron.getWeight(neuron));
079            }
080        }
081        return outputConnections;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * {@inheritDoc}
086     */
087    @Override
088    public Set<Neuron> getTargetNeurons(Neuron neuron) {
089        List<Neuron> neurons = connections.get(neuron);
090        return neurons == null ? Set.of() : new HashSet<>(neurons);
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * {@inheritDoc}
095     */
096    @Override
097    public int getParameterCount() {
098        int parameterCount = 0;
099        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
100            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
101                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
102                    continue;
103                }
104                parameterCount += neuron.getParameterCount();
105            }
106        }
107        return parameterCount;
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * {@inheritDoc}
112     */
113    @Override
114    public Array<Float> getParameters() {
115        Array<Float> parameters = Array.of(new Float[getParameterCount()]);
116        int i = 0;
117        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
118            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
119                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
120                    continue;
121                }
122                Array<Float> neuronParameters = neuron.getParameters();
123                parameters.set(neuronParameters, i, neuronParameters.length());
124            }
125        }
126        return parameters;
127    }
128
129    @Override
130    public Float getParameter(int p) {
131        return getParameters().get(p);
132    }
133
134    @Override
135    public void setParameters(Array<Float> values) {
136        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public void setParameter(int p, Float value) {
141        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
142    }
143
144    @Override
145    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> getNumberTypeSupport() {
146        return JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT;
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * {@inheritDoc}
151     */
152    @Override
153    public Array<Float> estimate(Array<Float> inputs) {
154        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
155            layer.forEach(Neuron::deactivate);
156        }
157        for (int j = 0; j < inputs.length(); j++) {
158            ((InputNeuron) layers.getFirst().get(j)).setInputValue(inputs.get(j));
159        }
160        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
161            layer.forEach(Neuron::activate);
162        }
163        List<? extends Neuron> outputLayer = layers.getLast();
164        Array<Float> outputs = Array.of(new Float[outputLayer.size()]);
165        for (int j = 0; j < outputs.length(); j++) {
166            outputs.set(j, outputLayer.get(j).getOutput());
167        }
168        return outputs;
169    }
170
171    /**
172     * {@inheritDoc}
173     */
174    @Override
175    public int arity() {
176        return layers.getFirst().size();
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * {@inheritDoc}
181     */
182    @Override
183    public int coArity() {
184        return layers.getLast().size();
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Accepts a visitor to inspect the complete neural network
189     *
190     * @param visitor the visitor to apply to this network
191     */
192    @Override
193    public void accept(NeuronVisitor visitor) {
194        if (visitor == null) {
195            return;
196        }
197        visitor.enterNetwork(this);
198
199        int depth = getDepth();
200        for (int l = 1; l <= depth; l++) {
201            visitor.enterLayer(this, l);
202
203            int width = getWidth(l);
204            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
205                Neuron neuron = getNeuron(l, j, Neuron.class);
206                visitor.visitNeuron(this, neuron, l, j);
207
208                Map<Neuron, Float> outs = getOutputConnections(l, j);
209                if (outs != null) {
210                    for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> connection : outs.entrySet()) {
211                        Neuron target = connection.getKey();
212                        Pair<Integer, Integer> targetPosition = positions.get(target);
213                        visitor.visitConnection(this, neuron, l, j,
214                                target, targetPosition.left(), targetPosition.right(), connection.getValue());
215                    }
216                }
217            }
218
219            visitor.exitLayer(this, l);
220        }
221
222        visitor.exitNetwork(this);
223    }
224}
